screeningSummary: Prank caller with debunked moon landing theory - admits to testing the host
arcNotes: Obvious prank, moon landing debunked on air, self-aware humor

lines.text: You're on the air. What's the conspiracy?
lines.voiceText: You're on the air. What's the conspiracy?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Alright, you're on. What's the conspiracy?
lines.voiceText: Alright, you're on. What's the conspiracy?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! What's the CONSPIRACY?!
lines.voiceText: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! What's the CONSPIRACY?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. What's this about?
lines.voiceText: You're on. What's this about?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. So?
lines.voiceText: You're on. So?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Oh good, a conspiracy theorist! What's the theory?!
lines.voiceText: Oh good, a conspiracy theorist! What's the theory?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. State your conspiracy hypothesis concisely.
lines.voiceText: You're on. State your conspiracy hypothesis concisely.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Okay, so I have this theory about the moon landing. It was filmed in a warehouse in Nevada, Vern. The flag was waving because there was a fan in the studio!
lines.voiceText: Okay, so I have this theory about the moon landing. It was filmed in a warehouse in Nevada, Vern. The flag was waving because there was a fan in the studio!
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: A fan in the studio. That's been thoroughly debunked. The flag had a horizontal rod to keep it extended. Any other theories?
lines.voiceText: A fan in the studio. That's been thoroughly debunked. The flag had a horizontal rod to keep it extended. Any other theories?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: A fan in the studio... that's been debunked. The flag had a rod. Other theories?
lines.voiceText: A fan in the studio... that's been debunked. The flag had a rod. Other theories?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: A FAN IN THE STUDIO! This is AMAZING! Wait - it's been DEBUNKED!
lines.voiceText: A FAN IN THE STUDIO! This is AMAZING! Wait - it's been DEBUNKED!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: A fan in the studio. Let me guess - the flag had a rod? Any other theories?
lines.voiceText: A fan in the studio. Let me guess - the flag had a rod? Any other theories?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Fan in the studio. Debunked. The flag had a rod. What else?
lines.voiceText: Fan in the studio. Debunked. The flag had a rod. What else?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: A FAN IN THE STUDIO! This is PERFECT radio! But wait - it's been DEBUNKED!
lines.voiceText: A FAN IN THE STUDIO! This is PERFECT radio! But wait - it's been DEBUNKED!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Horizontal rod mechanism has been extensively documented. What additional hypotheses do you possess?
lines.voiceText: Horizontal rod mechanism has been extensively documented. What additional hypotheses do you possess?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Well, no, but think about it - the astronauts never went back! Why wouldn't they go back if they really landed?!
lines.voiceText: Well, no, but think about it - the astronauts never went back! Why wouldn't they go back if they really landed?!
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: We did go back. Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17 all landed. Multiple missions over several years.
lines.voiceText: We did go back. Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17 all landed. Multiple missions over several years.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: We did go back... Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, 17... multiple missions...
lines.voiceText: We did go back... Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, 17... multiple missions...
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: WE DID GO BACK! Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17! MULTIPLE MISSIONS!
lines.voiceText: WE DID GO BACK! Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17! MULTIPLE MISSIONS!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: We did go back. Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17. Multiple landings. Any other theories?
lines.voiceText: We did go back. Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17. Multiple landings. Any other theories?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: We went back. Multiple missions. What's your next theory?
lines.voiceText: We went back. Multiple missions. What's your next theory?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: WE WENT BACK! Five more landings! This is GREAT radio!
lines.voiceText: WE WENT BACK! Five more landings! This is GREAT radio!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Apollo missions 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17 successfully landed. Additional lunar missions occurred. What else?
lines.voiceText: Apollo missions 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17 successfully landed. Additional lunar missions occurred. What else?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Oh. I... I didn't know that part.
lines.voiceText: Oh. I... I didn't know that part.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: There's a documentary about this. It's widely available. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: There's a documentary about this. It's widely available. Next caller.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: There's documentaries about this... widely available. Next.
lines.voiceText: There's documentaries about this... widely available. Next.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: There's DOCUMENTARIES about this! It's all ONLINE! Next caller!
lines.voiceText: There's DOCUMENTARIES about this! It's all ONLINE! Next caller!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: There's a documentary. It's available. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: There's a documentary. It's available. Next caller.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Documentary exists. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: Documentary exists. Next caller.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: It's all DOCUMENTED! Available everywhere! This is WHY I love this show! NEXT!
lines.voiceText: It's all DOCUMENTED! Available everywhere! This is WHY I love this show! NEXT!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Comprehensive documentation is readily accessible through standard research channels. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: Comprehensive documentation is readily accessible through standard research channels. Next caller.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: *laughing* Okay okay, I was just testing you! You passed! Great show, Vern!
lines.voiceText: *laughing* Okay okay, I was just testing you! You passed! Great show, Vern!
